        something they don&#x27;t have.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4122</td>
      <td>(Baccano!)</td>
      <td>Gustav St. Germain</td>
      <td>
        Depending on who you place in the same situation, the characteristics of
        said incident change kaleidoscopically. In other words, there is one
        incident; however, there are as many stories explaining it as there are
        people involved in it.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4123</td>
      <td>(Baccano!)</td>
      <td>Claire Stanfield</td>
      <td>
        It doesn&#x27;t matter who I am. You can just think of me as the talking
        air.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4124</td>
      <td>(Baccano!)</td>
      <td>Ladd Russo</td>
      <td>
        Now, dear Uncle, there&#x27;s a certain person that I&#x27;d just love
        to kill. It doesn&#x27;t even matter whether they&#x27;re weak or
        strong. The people I live to kill, that really get me jazzed... never
        see it coming. Never. They&#x27;re in some happy place where
        they&#x27;re sure nothing can get them. Dying is the furthest thing from
        their minds. Maybe they&#x27;re thinkin&#x27; about what they&#x27;re
        gonna have for dinner. Just like you were. Right before I walked in.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4125</td>
      <td>(Baccano!)</td>
      <td>Graham Specter</td>
      <td>
        [to Chane] Sorry about this, young lady, but not being able to verbalize
        might be a lucky break for you in a way. People can waste an awful lot
        of energy by putting sadness into words. Or maybe joy into words. And
        then of course, there&#x27;s putting anger into words. And the words can
        double when it comes to fear or pain. In that sense, being so afraid
        that you can&#x27;t find any words may save your life. Being unable to
        speak in extreme stress, in a body that is obligated to control energy
        consumption, is an act of, OH, I don&#x27;t know, maybe, self defense?
        Oh boy, I went and said a thing of actual intelligence there. Time to
        show me some love, boys!
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4126</td>
      <td>(Shingeki no Kyojin)</td>
      <td>Mikasa Ackerman</td>
      <td>This world is merciless, and it&#x27;s also very beautiful.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4127</td>
      <td>(Arakawa Under the Bridge)</td>
      <td>Nino</td>
      <td>
        The whale leaps. As high as he can imagine. Piercing the water from peak
        to peak. Is a yearning for the sky reflected in his eyes? What if this
        high point wasn&#x27;t merely the sky, but something far higher? If he
        knew of the infinite glitter of the stars, would his dreams soar even
        higher? Even if one doesn&#x27;t know why, to live is to constantly
        reach out. Not to a nervous restlessness, but to a constant motion of
        the heart.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4128</td>
      <td>(Arakawa Under the Bridge)</td>
      <td>Kou Ichinomiya</td>
      <td>
        First, we are born in the same galaxy. Born of the same species. Our
        lifetimes overlap. The meetings between humans are so unlikely as to be
        miraculous. To laugh, to cry, and to fall in love... Everyone is made up
        of a collection of 1% chances. Thus, I&#x27;m dazzled by the fact that
        there are so many miracles in this world.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4129</td>
      <td>(Dragon Ball)</td>
      <td>Grand Elder Guru</td>
      <td>Death is simply another stage of our life.\r\n\r\n</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4130</td>
      <td>(True Tears)</td>
      <td>Noe Isurugi</td>
      <td>
        On this earth, there are lots of difficult and painful things. I want to
        fly away and escape from it all. I want to flap my wings freely.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4131</td>
      <td>(Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru)</td>
      <td>Hachiman Hikigaya</td>
      <td>
        If you can&#x27;t get along without putting someone else down, it
        can&#x27;t be real friendship.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4132</td>
      <td>(Sword Art Online)</td>
      <td>Kazuto Kirigaya</td>
      <td>
        No point in wondering who someone really is, all you can do is trust
        them and accept them for who they are. Because the person you come to
        know is who that person really is.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4133</td>
      <td>(Dragon Ball)</td>
      <td>Son Goku</td>
      <td>
        Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that
        need.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4134</td>
      <td>(Berserk)</td>
      <td>Griffith</td>
      <td>
        It is my perception, that a true friend never relies on another&#x27;s
        dream. A person with the potential to be my true friend, must be able to
        find his reason for life without my help. And, he would have to put his
        heart and soul into protecting his dream. He would never hesitate to
        fight for his dream, even against me. For me, a true friend is one who
        stands equal on those terms.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4135</td>
      <td>(Fairy Tail)</td>
      <td>Kagura Mikazuchi</td>
      <td>Sometimes, mermaids can devour tigers.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4136</td>
      <td>(Berserk)</td>
      <td>Godo</td>
      <td>
        If you desire one thing for so long, it&#x27;s a given that you&#x27;ll
        miss other things along the way. That&#x27;s how it is... that&#x27;s
        life.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4137</td>
      <td>(Fairy Tail)</td>
      <td>Jellal Fernandes</td>
      <td>
        Life and death are the very basis of all things. They intensify every
        emotion. Or, to put it in a rather different way, there is nothing quite

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4138</td>
      <td>(MAGI: The Labyrinth Of Magic)</td>
      <td>Aladdin</td>
      <td>
        Destiny isn&#x27;t something to make you as you&#x27;re told. By
        overcoming difficulties, life and this whole world can advance forward.
        That&#x27;s what destiny is for. A world that has lost the power to
        advance forward, will be destroyed.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4139</td>
      <td>(Gantz)</td>
      <td>Gantz</td>
      <td>
        Humans believe their lives and ants lives are weighted differently. This
        is profound arrogance.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4140</td>
      <td>(CLANNAD)</td>
      <td>Furukawa Nagisa</td>
      <td>
        Life can bring lots of hardships, but it&#x27;s always important to keep
        in mind that there are people around you who care for you, and are
        willing to help you through whatever you&#x27;re dealing with.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4141</td>
      <td>(CLANNAD)</td>
      <td>Fujibayashi Ryou</td>
      <td>
        If a prediction is right, then it&#x27;s like you only have one future.
        Like that future has been decided. But if it&#x27;s wrong, then you have
        an almost infinite number of possibilities. And that means that even the
        tiniest twist of fate can change your future. I want to believe that I
        have choices - that the path I walk has many different turns, and many
        different roads to follow!
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4142</td>
      <td>(Zetsuen No Tempest)</td>
      <td>Yoshino Takigawa</td>
      <td>Lovers don&#x27;t need words to communicate.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4143</td>
      <td>(Shingeki no Kyojin)</td>
      <td>Armin Arlelt</td>
      <td>
        The people who have the ability to change something in this world, all,
        without exception, have guts to abandon things important to them if they
        have to.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4144</td>
      <td>(Gantz)</td>
      <td>Nishi Joichiro</td>
      <td>
        Anyone who points a gun at me dies. Got it? Point a gun at me, you die.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4145</td>
      <td>(Berserk)</td>
      <td>Void</td>
      <td>
        If fate is a principle beyond Human comprehension which capriciously
        torments man, then it is karma that man confront fate by embracing
        sorcery.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4146</td>
      <td>(Berserk)</td>
      <td>Godo</td>
      <td>Hate is a place, where a man who can&#x27;t stand sadness, goes.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4147</td>
      <td>(Fairy Tail)</td>
      <td>Kagura Mikazuchi</td>
      <td>
        I haven&#x27;t relied on luck since the moment I was born. Everything
        has been the result of my choices. That is what leads my existence
        towards the future.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4148</td>
      <td>(Kotoura-san)</td>
      <td>Yoshihisa Manabe</td>
      <td>
        People who want to leave are going to leave. But not everyone is like
        that.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4149</td>
      <td>(MAGI: The Labyrinth Of Magic)</td>
      <td>Aladdin</td>
      <td>
        I&#x27;ve learned that from a war ignited by revenge, nothing can be
        born, but sorrow.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4150</td>
      <td>(Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru)</td>
      <td>Hachiman Hikigaya</td>
      <td>Hard work betrays none, but dreams betray many.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4151</td>
      <td>(Steins;Gate)</td>
      <td>Okabe Rintarou</td>
      <td>
        If you want to grant your own wish, then you should clear your own path
        to it.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4152</td>
      <td>(Fairy Tail)</td>
      <td>Loke</td>
      <td>
        Do you understand the sorrow of a star that cannot return to the
        heavens?
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4153</td>
      <td>(Sankarea)</td>
      <td>Rea Sanka</td>
      <td>
        I don&#x27;t know what&#x27;s happened to you, but you shouldn&#x27;t
        suppress your feelings if you&#x27;re angry or sad. It&#x27;s okay to
        let it all out.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4154</td>
      <td>(Disgaea)</td>
      <td>Laharl</td>
      <td>You have no effect on me because you are flat chested!\r\n\r\n</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4155</td>
      <td>(CLANNAD)</td>
      <td>Okazaki Ushio</td>
      <td>
        Sanae-san told me, places that I can cry are in a toilet, or in
        daddy&#x27;s arms.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4156</td>
      <td>(Welcome to the N.H.K)</td>
      <td>Kaoru Yamazaki</td>
      <td>
        People like us aren&#x27;t qualified to be involved in a dramatic
        incident such as a suicide. No matter how depressed you are or how much
        pain you&#x27;re in, you have to return to your routine, daily life.
        Even if you don&#x27;t come back, you&#x27;ll just end up dying in vain.
        A dramatic death isn&#x27;t befitting of us.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4157</td>
      <td>(Gintama)</td>
      <td>Gintama</td>
      <td>
        Do you have any idea how stupid we are? Don&#x27;t underestimate
        us!!!\r\n
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4158</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Maes Hughes</td>
      <td>
        Okay, here&#x27;s the plan: We go in, start hitting people, and see
        where it takes us.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4159</td>
      <td>(Steins;Gate)</td>
      <td>Okabe Rintarou</td>
      <td>
        The&quot;&#x27;present&quot; is a leaf floating on top of the river. It
        moves along with the flow from past to future.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4160</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Lan Fan</td>
      <td>
        A king is no king without his people. But people without a king are lost
        as well!
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4161</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Greed</td>
      <td>There&#x27;s no such thing as no such thing.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4162</td>
      <td>(Katekyo Hitman Reborn!)</td>
      <td>Yamamoto Tsuyoshi</td>
      <td>
        It&#x27;s not an issue of what you should do, it&#x27;s an issue of what
        you want to do.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4163</td>
      <td>(Ghost in the Shell)</td>
      <td>Batou</td>
      <td>I guess once you start doubting, there&#x27;s no end to it.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4164</td>
      <td>(Detective Conan)</td>
      <td>Ai Haibara</td>
      <td>
        People have emotions. A troublesome attribute that&#x27;s not only
        invisible, but also changes easily. If it&#x27;s friendship or love,
        then that&#x27;s fine. But if by some trigger it changes to malice and
        vengeance, then that could bring forth thoughts of murder.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4165</td>
      <td>(Fairy Tail)</td>
      <td>Lisanna Strauss</td>
      <td>
        All living things eventually die. It&#x27;s unavoidable. But as long as
        you remember, it will live on in your heart forever.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4166</td>
      <td>(Fairy Tail)</td>
      <td>Evergreen</td>
      <td>I love flowers. They look so good... On me.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4167</td>
      <td>(Fairy Tail)</td>
      <td>Makarov Dreyar</td>
      <td>
        Magic is anything you can think of. It can be felt in infinite ways...
        As light, as darkness, as red, as blue. It is living freely, together
        along side Fairy Tail.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4168</td>
      <td>(Fairy Tail)</td>
      <td>Erza Scarlet</td>
      <td>
        I wonder how long... How long will I remain anchored at this harbor
        known as battle?
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4169</td>
      <td>(Fairy Tail)</td>
      <td>Gray Fullbuster</td>
      <td>
        I don&#x27;t care where I get hurt, as long as my injuries are visible.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4170</td>
      <td>(Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai)</td>
      <td>Chiriko Tsurumi</td>
      <td>
        I&#x27;ll never dream about things that I know won&#x27;t come true.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4171</td>
      <td>(Medaka Box)</td>
      <td>Medaka Kurokami</td>
      <td>
        Is the world too peaceful? Is the future bothersome? Is reality your
        enemy? Don&#x27;t worry, even if it is - LIFE IS EPIC.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4172</td>
      <td>(Ouran High School Host Club)</td>
      <td>Hikaru Hitachiin</td>
      <td>
        Well, I don&#x27;t see what&#x27;s so funny. I&#x27;m honest, I speak my
        mind, and I don&#x27;t hold back. It&#x27;s sneaky people like Kaoru who
        are the troublemakers.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4173</td>
      <td>(Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru)</td>
      <td>Hachiman Hikigaya</td>
      <td>Ignorance is bliss, isn&#x27;t it?</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4174</td>
      <td>(Devil Survivor 2)</td>
      <td>Yamato Hotsuin</td>
      <td>
        Surviving means continuing to shoulder one&#x27;s burden. When you
        can&#x27;t handle that strain, then you&#x27;ll be the one to die next.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4175</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Riza Hawkeye</td>
      <td>
        The heroes during times of war, are nothing but mass murderers during
        times of peace.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4176</td>
      <td>(Toaru Majutsu no Index)</td>
      <td>Accelerator</td>
      <td>
        Just because I&#x27;ve gotten weaker, it doesn&#x27;t mean that
        you&#x27;ve gotten stronger, right?
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4177</td>
      <td>(Fate/zero)</td>
      <td>Rider</td>
      <td>
        The King lives to the fullest! He needs to live more fully than anyone
        else. He is a figure of admiration to his people!
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4178</td>
      <td>(Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru)</td>
      <td>Hachiman Hikigaya</td>
      <td>
        When humans are faced with truly terrifying circumstances, they

    <tr>
      <td>4539</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood)</td>
      <td>Truth</td>
      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>4540</td>
      <td>(The Big O)</td>
      <td>Roger Smith</td>
      <td>
        This place, Paradigm City, is a town of forgetfulness. One day, forty

    <tr>
      <td>4541</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>

      <td>

        they&#x27;ll ask for your help. And when they do, I know that

    <tr>

    <tr>

    <tr>

    <tr>

    <tr>

    <tr>

    <tr>

      <td>(Fate/zero)</td>
      <td>Rider</td>
      <td>

        admire the martyr&#x27;s thorny path? Who dreams of such an

    <tr>

      <td>(Fate/zero)</td>
      <td>Berserker</td>
      <td>

      <td>

    <tr>

    <tr>

      <td>

    <tr>

      <td>

    <tr>

    <tr>

      <td>

    <tr>

    <tr>

      <td>

      <td>

    <tr>

    <tr>

      <td>Touya</td>
      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>4578</td>
      <td>(The Garden of Sinners)</td>
      <td>Aozaki Touko</td>
      <td>

    <tr>

      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>4582</td>
      <td>(Special A)</td>
      <td>Tadashi Karino</td>
      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>4583</td>
      <td>(The Garden of Sinners)</td>
      <td>Aozaki Touko</td>
      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>4584</td>

      <td>Okajima Rokuro</td>
      <td>

        swallowed by the darkness, never to return. A cruel fate awaits any

        Right now another sacrificial lamb has wandered too far from home. The
        city awaits.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4585</td>
      <td>(Casshern Sins)</td>
      <td>Casshern</td>
      <td>

        and they are merely drinking their fill. But Dio and all the people
        I&#x27;ve met on my journey aren&#x27;t like that... they&#x27;re..

    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4586</td>
      <td>(The Garden of Sinners)</td>
      <td>Fujou Kirie</td>
      <td>
        It wasn&#x27;t the pain that hurt me. Rather, it was the feeling of me
        being ripped apart, and the sound of the knife plunging deep, deep into
        my heart. That incomparably bittersweet fear. My body shook and trembled

    <tr>

        won&#x27;t be anybody there, ladies and gentlemen. Not you, not me...

    <tr>

    <tr>

    <tr>

    <tr>

      <td>6277</td>
      <td>(Fate/stay night)</td>
      <td>Emiya Shirou</td>
      <td>Do you have enough swords, King of Heroes?</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6278</td>
      <td>(Fate/stay night)</td>
      <td>Emiya Shirou</td>
      <td>
        It feels so close to me, yet I can&#x27;t reach it even if I hold out my
        hands. But even if I can&#x27;t reach it, there are things that will
        stay in my heart. Being in the same time and looking at the same sky
        \xe2\x80\x93 if I can remember that, then even if we are far apart, I
        believe we can still be together.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6279</td>
      <td>(Fate/stay night)</td>
      <td>Emiya Shirou</td>
      <td>
        Someday, my memories of her will fade. Her voice, her actions
        \xe2\x80\x93 I might forget them as well. But even then, I will always
        remember that I loved her.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6280</td>
      <td>(Elfen Lied)</td>
      <td>Lucy</td>
      <td>
        You suddenly appeared in front of me in this hell. The day that I would
        get to meet you...I always wanted to apologize to you...I only endured
        because of that! I kept on living.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6281</td>
      <td>(Elfen Lied)</td>
      <td>Lucy</td>
      <td>I hate these horns.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6282</td>
      <td>(Elfen Lied)</td>
      <td>Lucy</td>
      <td>
        When you are miserable, you need something that is even more miserable
        than you to feel good about yourself.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6283</td>
      <td>(Elfen Lied)</td>
      <td>Lucy</td>
      <td>
        I was going to let you go. After all, there aren&#x27;t many of us out
        there, but you&#x27;re just such a pain in the ass.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6284</td>
      <td>(Elfen Lied)</td>
      <td>Lucy</td>
      <td>

        they&#x27;re probably looking for someone worse off than they are.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6285</td>
      <td>(Honey and Clover)</td>
      <td>Yuuta Takemoto</td>
      <td>

        the days just keep on moving. But even then If I keep on going like
        this, will I be able to see it? Maybe someday.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6286</td>
      <td>(Honey and Clover)</td>
      <td>Yuuta Takemoto</td>
      <td>

        it&#x27;s tough...
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6287</td>
      <td>(Honey and Clover)</td>
      <td>Takumi Nomiya</td>
      <td>

        he just dumped.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6288</td>
      <td>(Honey and Clover)</td>
      <td>Takumi Nomiya</td>
      <td>
        Mayama, if you can&#x27;t be with her on every festival, then you have
        no right to say anything.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6289</td>
      <td>(Honey and Clover)</td>
      <td>Ayumi Yamada</td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6290</td>
      <td>(Honey and Clover)</td>
      <td>Yuuta Takemoto</td>
      <td>
        When we were together, my heart felt tight, too tight to even drink
        water. If that&#x27;s called love, then it was really just me who was in
        love. Just me.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6291</td>
      <td>(Honey and Clover)</td>
      <td>Yuuta Takemoto</td>
      <td>

        memories, will eventually come. But I&#x27;ll probably remember over and

        searched for just one thing.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6292</td>
      <td>(Honey and Clover)</td>
      <td>Rika Harada</td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6293</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Edward Elric</td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6294</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Maes Hughes</td>
      <td>

        clothes washed up further downstream. We don&#x27;t know if that means

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6295</td>
      <td>(Jigoku Shoujo)</td>
      <td>Ai Enma</td>
      <td>We will take revenge on your behalf.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6296</td>
      <td>(Jigoku Shoujo)</td>
      <td>Ai Enma</td>
      <td>I shall cleanse away thy bitterness...</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6297</td>
      <td>(Jigoku Shoujo)</td>
      <td>Ai Enma</td>
      <td>You are coming with me, we are going to hell.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6298</td>
      <td>(Jigoku Shoujo)</td>
      <td>Ai Enma</td>
      <td>
        Pitiful shadow cloaked in darkness. Thy action cause men pain and
        suffering. Thy hollow soul drowns in thy sins. How would you like to see
        what death is like?
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6299</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Maes Hughes</td>
      <td>
        Yeah, it&#x27;s still a nameless sniper. It&#x27;s become quite a topic
        among us. She&#x27;s still a cadet from the military academy, but at any
        rate she&#x27;s got a good arm. It seems she&#x27;s been brought all the
        way out here. Hah... to think they have to pull out even a little chick
        like that... this must be the end.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6300</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Maes Hughes</td>
      <td>
        *to Edward* So, you hooked up with your mechanic, huh? Not too shabby,
        sprout.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6301</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Maes Hughes</td>
      <td>A bratty little midget.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6302</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Maes Hughes</td>
      <td>

        it or not&quot; episode with nutcases like you guys!
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6303</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Maes Hughes</td>
      <td>Are you telling me to go back and put a corpse on trial?</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6304</td>
      <td>(Death Note)</td>
      <td>L Lawliet</td>
      <td>
        If you use your head, you won&#x27;t get fat even if you eat sweets.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6305</td>
      <td>(Bleach)</td>
      <td>Kuchiki Byakuya</td>
      <td>
        Let me tell you about the difference between you and me. It&#x27;s like
        the story of the monkey trying to capture the moon. However close he
        thinks he is to the moon, it&#x27;s still just the reflection of the
        moon in the middle of the lake. No matter how he struggles to capture

        no avail. You will never reach me.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6306</td>
      <td>(Sailor Moon)</td>
      <td>Usagi Tsukino</td>
      <td>
        If the pride of a senshi means hurting each other, I don&#x27;t want it.
        Nothing will come out of fighting. Fighting isn&#x27;t the only way to

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6307</td>
      <td>(Sailor Moon)</td>
      <td>Mamoru Chiba</td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6308</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Maes Hughes</td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6309</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Roy Mustang</td>
      <td>If your opponent is of choleric temper, seek to irritate.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6310</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Edward Elric</td>
      <td>
        The great flow that maintains the universe, call it the cycle of life,
        the course of nature each one of us is just a small part of that part.
        One in the all. Yet without all the individual ones, the all can&#x27;t
        exist. This world flows by following grander laws that we can&#x27;t

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6311</td>
      <td>(Sailor Moon)</td>
      <td>Usagi Tsukino</td>
      <td>
        I wasn&#x27;t always fighting for love and justice. I was fighting for
        my friends and loved ones.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6312</td>
      <td>(Fullmetal Alchemist)</td>
      <td>Alphonse Elric</td>
      <td>Some memories... aren&#x27;t meant to leave traces.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6313</td>
      <td>(Tsubasa Reservoir Chronicle)</td>
      <td>Kurogane</td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6314</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Nicholas D. Wolfwood</td>
      <td>

        kid...
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6315</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Meryl Stryfe</td>
      <td>
        Vash the Stampede... every time I observe his actions I can&#x27;t help
        but sense something hidden deep within him, something we can&#x27;t
        being to understand. But this much is certain: everyone who has become
        involved with him has somehow regained an emotion which was once lost.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6316</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Nicholas D. Wolfwood</td>
      <td>
        I picked up my first gun at the age of seven. And I shot. I remember how
        strangely easy it was to pull the trigger. Ha. I actually laughed.
        Because that one shot was all that was needed to silence that sickening
        piece of garbage who had the nerve to call himself my guardian. Ha. It
        was that simple. And so I was free. Yes, tomorrow would be different.
        Hm. Tomorrow. As much as I wanted to believe, it only went from bad to
        worse. A vicious cycle... I didn&#x27;t want other kids to grow up like
        me, so I started my own orphanage. It was gratifying work, I was
        actually doing something for the good of others. It was my place of
        peace and happiness... yet sometimes, I still think to myself
        &quot;there&#x27;s no place worse than this planet. It&#x27;s horrible
        here.&quot;
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6317</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Nicholas D. Wolfwood</td>
      <td>NEEDLENOGGIN!</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6318</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Vash the Stampede</td>
      <td>Dangerous toys are fun, but you can get hurt.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6319</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Vash the Stampede</td>
      <td>
        Those who make mistakes blame themselves and close their hearts.
        It&#x27;s impossible to fix the mistake. Men can&#x27;t return to the
        past. That&#x27;s why they drink. Lushes, drunks, sliding alcohol down
        their throats to try to dilute the memories that can&#x27;t be
        forgotten. Frank Marlon, the gunsmith, does nothing but drink, and
        questions the glass after it&#x27;s empty. &quot;Am I wrong? Was I
        wrong?&quot;
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6320</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Nicholas D. Wolfwood</td>
      <td>Come again, Needle Noggin?</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6321</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Vash the Stampede</td>
      <td>
        [singing] Total slaughter, total slaughter. I won&#x27;t leave a single
        man alive. La de da de die, genocide. La de da de dud, an ocean of
        blood. Let&#x27;s begin the killing time.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6322</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Vash the Stampede</td>
      <td>

        quit after three seconds.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6323</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Vash the Stampede</td>
      <td>

        BANG.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6324</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Meryl Stryfe</td>
      <td>
        Does this man look like the legendary gunman Vash the Stampede? That

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6325</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Nicholas D. Wolfwood</td>
      <td>
        I always knew you were no mere mortal... but I had no idea that you were
        a cat.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6326</td>
      <td>(Trigun)</td>
      <td>Vash the Stampede</td>
      <td>
        Hey, &quot;Thou Shalt Not Kill&quot;, remember? What kind of church man

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>

      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Naraku</td>
      <td>You&#x27;re not as slow as you look, monk.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6328</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Naraku</td>
      <td>Well, well, if it isn&#x27;t the holy monk.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6329</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Sesshomaru</td>
      <td>
        *to Inuyasha* Your stupidity knows no boundaries. Run and hide while you

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6330</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Sesshomaru</td>
      <td>The little man is having trouble holding his sword. *to Inuyasha*</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6331</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Sesshomaru</td>
      <td>

    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6332</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Sesshomaru</td>

    <tr>
      <td>6333</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Sesshomaru</td>

    <tr>
      <td>6334</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Sesshomaru</td>
      <td>Be not a fool, I have no such time to waste.</td>

    <tr>
      <td>6335</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Sesshomaru</td>

    <tr>

      <td>Sesshomaru</td>
      <td>

    <tr>

      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Kikyo</td>

    <tr>

      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>

    <tr>
      <td>6339</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Kikyo</td>
      <td>Stop coming after the jewel. I do not wish to waste more arrows.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6340</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Kikyo</td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6341</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Kikyo</td>
      <td>You vile beast. I despise you. You loathsome half man.</td>

    <tr>
      <td>6342</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Kikyo</td>

    <tr>
      <td>6343</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>

    <tr>
      <td>6344</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>

      <td>6345</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Inuyasha</td>
      <td>Well excuse me for making you sleep in the wild all the time.</td>

    <tr>
      <td>6346</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Inuyasha</td>
      <td>
        That&#x27;s pretty bad when you can even give a half demon the creeps.
        *to Kagome*
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6347</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Inuyasha</td>
      <td>
        Are you going to keep staring at me because it&#x27;s ticking me off. If
        you got something to say, say it.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6348</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Kagome Higurashi</td>
      <td>It&#x27;s nice not to be alone.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6349</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Kagome Higurashi</td>
      <td>He&#x27;s thanking me? That can&#x27;t be good. *about Inuyasha*</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6350</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Kagome Higurashi</td>
      <td>I was wrong, kill him.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6351</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Kagome Higurashi</td>
      <td>

      </td>

    <tr>
      <td>6352</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Inuyasha</td>
      <td>You sent me into a battle armed with a mere hunch?</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6353</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Inuyasha</td>
      <td>
        I&#x27;d rather give up my eye, than give up his sword. Maybe I&#x27;m
        not so worthless after all.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6354</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Inuyasha</td>
      <td>
        I&#x27;m gonna slit your stomach, take out your guts, and put them in a
        bowl. By the time I&#x27;m through with you, you&#x27;re going to wish
        it was you who was dead.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6355</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Inuyasha</td>
      <td>
        Don&#x27;t be stupid. You&#x27;re just a human. So back off, shut up,
        and butt out. *to Kagome*
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6356</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Shippou</td>
      <td>
        That&#x27;s why Kagome sent me, so I can protect you from being
        protected by him.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6357</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Shippou</td>
      <td>Kagome, what do you have in your bag? Rocks?</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6358</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Shippou</td>
      <td>
        Just apologize, even if you don&#x27;t mean it. *to some kid, about
        Inuyasha*
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6359</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Shippou</td>
      <td>Six innocent peasants down, hundreds of thousand more to go.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6360</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Shippou</td>
      <td>Aahhh someone saves me.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>6361</td>
      <td>(Inuyasha)</td>
      <td>Shippou</td>
      <td>You shouldn&#x27;t talk to yourself. People will wonder.</td>
    </tr>

      <td>

        achieve it, as if it were some tangible thing... But... The fact of the
        matter is, perfection is a hollow shell. It is devoid of any substance.
        I spit on perfection. Perfection, after all, implies you&#x27;ve reached
        the summit. No trial and error, no ability to conceptualize. An
        omniscient being would have no need for such superfluous things... Am I
        making myself clear? For people who dabble in the sciences, such as
        ourselves, perfection would make us obsolete. Many magnificent things
        have been, and will continue to come into existence... And yet every
        last one of them will fall short of perfection&#x27;s finish. Our
        function as men of science relies on their many shortcomings. Then, and
        only then, can we apply the fruits of our labor. To put it simply... As
        soon as you began spouting that nonsense about being an immaculate
        being... your fate was sealed. How dare you call yourself a man of
        science?

      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>
        Are you sure? Even if the hidden truth is drenched in blood... Do you
        still want to know?
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7522</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>
        I&#x27;ve been wondering ever since before, why do you always look so
        sad whenever you&#x27;re with me?
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7523</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>It&#x27;s all right, for now. Yuki will eventually come to me.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7524</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>
        Humans should never be turned into vampires. But in the old days, hidden
        from history, when the war between vampires and vampire hunters was at
        its peak, vampires turned many humans into vampires to use in battle.
        And now the aristocrats have the duty to manage those survivors.
        Sometimes we have to kill them off...
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7525</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>
        It&#x27;s all right. You be just the way you are, Yuki. You&#x27;re
        different from the Night Class students who wait on me... You&#x27;re a
        warm-hearted girl, Yuki. That&#x27;s more than enough.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7526</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>
        The blood has stopped flowing, but the puncture wounds...he really
        pierced you deeply. Yuki...does it hurt? Are you afraid of vampires now?
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7527</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>
        You devoured her mercilessly. She can&#x27;t even stand up. Was her
        blood so delicious?
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7528</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>
        A human bitten by a pureblood vampire transforms into a vampire. When
        that happens, there can be only one of two results, dying from the loss
        of blood, or unfavorably surviving and suffering the pain of slowly
        transforming into a vampire. Other vampires don&#x27;t possess this dark
        power that purebloods have. I respect his strength of will, he was only
        a human, yet he resisted the powerful vampire instinct for four years.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7529</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>
        Headmaster Cross, how much longer are you going to keep Zero in the Day
        Class? That time is approaching for him.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7530</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>
      <td>
        After we turn around, the next time we see each other, I will kill you.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7531</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>
      <td>
        Listen up, brats! Get the hell back to your dorms! Why do I have to deal
        with you running around screaming &quot;Kyaa! Kyaa!&quot; every damn
        day?! Why?!
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7532</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>
      <td>
        But you thought it would be okay to become a vampire, right? I will
        never let you turn into something like that. Even if it means I have to
        make Kaname Kuran my enemy...and even if it means you will hate me.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7533</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>
      <td>
        Former humans eventually fall into the Level E category, Yuki. They
        gradually lose their sanity, reaching their &quot;end&quot; - their
        destruction.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7534</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>
      <td>
        I borrowed it from the Headmaster. It&#x27;s a gun to use against
        vampires. If I lose the human part of me, and go mad as a
        vampire...shoot me with that gun. Not yet, but that day will eventually
        come. Kill me by your own hand then.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7535</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>
      <td>
        I couldn&#x27;t stop myself from devouring you. I may kill the next
        human I target as my prey. Shoot me. You&#x27;re afraid of me,
        aren&#x27;t you? Hold the gun with both hands, and aim straight. Aim for
        my heart. It&#x27;s not a crime to kill a vampire.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7536</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>
      <td>
        You heard it too? The sound of your blood being sucked in by me. After
        such a hair-raising experience you can&#x27;t act as if nothing has
        changed. So don&#x27;t interfere anymore.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7537</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>
      <td>Come on vampires. I&#x27;ve been pissed off lately.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7538</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>
      <td>
        The Headmaster talks about the Night Class like they&#x27;re good
        vampires who support his pacifism, but I don&#x27;t trust them. I
        won&#x27;t let my guard down. I&#x27;m cooperating so I can find the
        most effective way to kill those beasts in human form.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7539</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Yuki Kuran</td>
      <td>I will keep running away so Zero has a reason to live.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7540</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Yuki Kuran</td>
      <td>
        Both of us understand, but neither of us will say it. It&#x27;s a sin to
        keep a vampire alive by offering my own blood as bait. We are doing
        something that is forbidden. No one must find out about this.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7541</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Yuki Kuran</td>
      <td>
        Being like this makes me feel like we&#x27;ve returned to the old days
        somewhat. Yeah. Zero is Zero. Even if you are a vampire now.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7542</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Yuki Kuran</td>
      <td>
        I didn&#x27;t understand anything. Zero suffered and suffered for four
        years. What were you thinking, all by yourself? He loathes vampires so
        much, he wants to kill them all. All this time, Zero wanted to kill
        himself too.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7543</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>

        bitten by another.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7544</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Yuki Kuran</td>
      <td>

        thing that the same feeling makes me want to latch onto his throat and
        devour his blood and even his life to taste his feelings in it?
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7545</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>
      <td>
        I refuse to breathe the same air as those creatures. I refuse to wear
        the stupid uniform full of buttons that those creatures wear. If I am
        imprisoned in a classroom full of those creatures, I will certainly lose
        it, I will massacre every single one of them.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7546</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>
        You are the only one who brings color into the dull gray ashes that my
        heart is.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7547</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>
        If my only option I have is to lose you, then I would prefer death
        instead. Be it yours, by my hand, or could you please kill me then
        yuki..?
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7548</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>
      <td>

        would hold on to, so I wouldn&#x27;t drown.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7549</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>
      <td>It is the vampire hunter&#x27;s duty to kill vampires.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7550</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Hanabusa Aidou</td>
      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>7551</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7552</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7553</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Kaname Kuran</td>
      <td>

    <tr>

      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>

    <tr>

      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>

    <tr>
      <td>7566</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>
      <td>Zero Kiriyuu</td>

    <tr>
      <td>7567</td>
      <td>(Vampire Knight)</td>

    <tr>

    <tr>

    <tr>

    <tr>
      <td>7835</td>

    <tr>

    <tr>

    <tr>

    <tr>

    <tr>
      <td>7903</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Tenten</td>
      <td>

    <tr>

    <tr>

      <td>(Naruto)</td>

    <tr>
      <td>7906</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Tenten</td>

    <tr>
      <td>7907</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Tenten</td>
      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>7908</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Tenten</td>
      <td>I can&#x27;t stand weak and indecisive people!</td>

    <tr>
      <td>7909</td>

      <td>Tenten</td>
      <td>

    <tr>

    <tr>
      <td>7911</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Hiruzen Sarutobi</td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7912</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Hiruzen Sarutobi</td>
      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>7913</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Hiruzen Sarutobi</td>
      <td>I wonder...do you have it, young as you are... the Will of Fire?</td>

    <tr>
      <td>7914</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Hiruzen Sarutobi</td>

    <tr>
      <td>7916</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Tsunade</td>
      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>7917</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Tsunade</td>
      <td>

      </td>

    <tr>

    <tr>
      <td>7919</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Tsunade</td>
      <td>

      </td>

    <tr>
      <td>7920</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Tsunade</td>
      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>7921</td>

    <tr>
      <td>7923</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Kisame Hoshigaki</td>
      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>7924</td>

      <td>Kisame Hoshigaki</td>
      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>7925</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Kisame Hoshigaki</td>
      <td>

        Akatsuki. So be careful... of me.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7926</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Kisame Hoshigaki</td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7927</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Zabuza Momochi</td>
      <td>*to Kakashi* I died as a human!</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7928</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Zabuza Momochi</td>
      <td>
        *last words* You were always at my side, the least I can do is to be
        beside you at the end. I know it cannot be, but I wish I could go to
        where you have gone. How I wish I could join you there, Haku.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7929</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Zabuza Momochi</td>
      <td>

        eternity!
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7930</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Zabuza Momochi</td>
      <td>

    <tr>
      <td>7931</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Zabuza Momochi</td>
      <td>

      </td>

    <tr>
      <td>7932</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Zabuza Momochi</td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7933</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Zabuza Momochi</td>
      <td>*to Naruto* Your words cut deep, deeper than any blade.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7934</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Zabuza Momochi</td>
      <td>
        When you&#x27;ve hovered between life and death so many times that it

        become so deadly that your profile has been entered into my bingo book,

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7935</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Zabuza Momochi</td>
      <td>
        You&#x27;re right. Those little people and their little dreams, why
        should I care about them?! I have my own dream!
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7936</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Zabuza Momochi</td>
      <td>When I was your age, my hands were already soaked in blood...</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7937</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Hinata Hyuuga</td>
      <td>

        you... You helped me find the right path... I always chased after you...
        I wanted to catch up to you... I wanted to walk beside you all the
        time... I just wanted to be with you... You changed me! Your smile is
        what saved me! That is why I&#x27;m not afraid to die protecting you!
        Because... I love you...
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7938</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Hinata Hyuuga</td>
      <td>I won&#x27;t let you lay another finger on Naruto!</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7939</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>

      <td>
        *to Naruto* You make mistakes... but... because of those mistakes... you

        truly strong.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>7940</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Hinata Hyuuga</td>
      <td>
        *to Naruto* When I watch you, I feel strong, like I can do anything -

    <tr>

      <td>Hinata Hyuuga</td>
      <td>

    <tr>

      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Hinata Hyuuga</td>
      <td>Was I able to change myself...even a little, N-Naruto-kun?</td>

    <tr>

      <td>(Naruto)</td>

      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>

      <td>(Naruto)</td>

      <td>By the way, I&#x27;m a boy.</td>

    <tr>
      <td>7945</td>
      <td>(Naruto)</td>
      <td>Naruto Uzumaki</td>
      <td>
        My name is Uzumaki Naruto. I like ramen. I hate the three minutes you
        have to wait while the water boils. And my dream is to one day become a
        Hokage. Then everyone will have to respect me at last.
      </td>
